clinical_study.brief_title: Incidence of Metal Failure During First Year Following Transpedicular Screws Fixation of Dorsolumbar Spine Fracture
clinical_study.official_title: Incidence of Metal Failure During First Year Following Transpedicular Screws Fixation of Dorso Lumbar Spine Fracture

brief_summary.textblock: Recording incidence of metal failure in transpedicular screws fixation of dorsal umbra spine fracture during first year follow up

primary_outcome.measure: radiological assessment of transpedicular screws after dorsolumbar fixation
primary_outcome.description: Broken rods screws loosening of screws and nuts

intervention.description: Plain x-rays anteroposterior and lateral views to determine system failure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients
- post traumatic dorsolumbar spine fracture fixed with short or long segment transpedicular screws
- With or without decompression
Exclusion Criteria:
- pediatric patients
- Pathological fractures
